descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**Skydive Sim — Soar over the real world with Google Earth integration
(Google Earth Included! No subscription required!)**

**The most exciting way to explore the globe. The World Is Yours!**

Step out of the aircraft and into the planet’s most authentic skydiving playground. Skydive Sim combines cutting-edge VR physics with live Google Earth terrain, so every aircraft jump, cliff dive, beach swoop, or skyscraper fly-by happens above photo-real locations you already know and love.

**Freefall, track, BASE jump, swoop, or launch with a jet pack — all without restarting — for endless exploration and canopy-landing practice.**

Ultra-realistic canopy physics
Dial in your canopy settings, toggle presets, pull front risers, or go full competition-style swooping.

**Visit new places and drop zones virtually before you arrive in person**

Experience line twists, cutaways, and reserve deployments.

**Exit from an airplane, helicopter, hot-air balloon,  or jump into our vertical wind tunnel for fast skills drills.**

Global multiplayer
Meet friends or teammates anywhere on the planet, organize formation jumps, and share the view in real time.

**Jet Packs
Hover, climb, or pause mid-air to perfect maneuvers and instantly re-attempt canopy landings.**

Master Skydive Sim controls through an in-depth tutorial level, plus a growing library of video guides. Learn more & support: SkydiveSim.com

Hand tracking is supported for core interactions.

Skydive Sim is designed for entertainment and not intended for skydiving training.
